design_philosophy.visual_style: Modern Minimalist x Victorian Gothic. Deep shadows, warm gold accents, and physical textures (wood, paper) blended with clean modern UI.

grid_system.game_hud: absolute inset-0 pointer-events-none flex flex-col justify-between p-6

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4AF37] text-black font-bold hover:bg-[#F4CF57] transition-all duration-300 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(212,175,55,0.2)] hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(212,175,55,0.4)] uppercase tracking-widest text-sm px-8 py-3 rounded-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#D4AF37]/30 text-[#D4AF37] hover:border-[#D4AF37] hover:bg-[#D4AF37]/10 transition-all duration-300 uppercase tracking-widest text-sm px-8 py-3 rounded-sm

cards.glass: bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 shadow-2xl rounded-xl p-6
cards.wood_panel: bg-[#1a1818] border border-[#3a3a3a] shadow-xl rounded-lg p-6 relative overflow-hidden

inputs.default: bg-black/20 border border-white/10 focus:border-[#D4AF37] text-white placeholder:text-white/20 rounded-md px-4 py-3 outline-none transition-all duration-300 font-mono

modals.overlay: fixed inset-0 bg-black/90 backdrop-blur-sm z-50 flex items-center justify-center p-4
modals.content: bg-[#141414] border border-[#D4AF37]/20 w-full max-w-lg rounded-xl shadow-[0_0_50px_rgba(0,0,0,0.8)] p-8 relative

ui_overlays.inventory: Fixed bottom bar, glassmorphism style, slots with 1px white/20 border
ui_overlays.chat: Fixed right side, collapsible, semi-transparent black background
ui_overlays.joystick: Touch devices only, bottom-left, minimal white outline

universal_guidelines: Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Do not use gradients for dark backgrounds; use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Use 'framer-motion' for all UI transitions (modals, inventory slide-in).
Game rendering must be done on HTML5 Canvas via a React Ref.
UI must be responsive: Stack panels on mobile, side-by-side on desktop.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all headings to maintain the 'Study' aesthetic.
Never use pure black (#000000); use #0a0a0a or #121212.
Interactive objects in the game should have a subtle 'pulse' animation.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: 'framer-motion', 'sonner', 'lucide-react'. 2. Set up the Tailwind config to include the custom colors and fonts defined above. 3. Create a 'GameCanvas' component that handles the rendering loop. 4. Build the 'Lobby' using the Bento grid layout. 5. Implement the 'Inventory' as a fixed overlay. 6. Use the provided image URLs for texture backgrounds where appropriate (e.g., modal backgrounds or inventory slots).
